This variant of '''Chilled Meat''' is a quest item that can be obtained during the {{Quest|Only Half-Frozen}} by killing the frozen [[Snowboar]] located at [[Snow-Covered Path]], [[Mondstadt]]. It has the same description as the food ingredient.
